name: CreateExperimentSavedMetrics
description:
Create and save metrics for an experiment in a project.

Use this tool to create and save experiment metrics within a specified project. It is useful when you need to add new metrics to an experiment's saved data.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project for which you want to create and save experiment metrics. Obtain from /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: experiment_metrics_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details like id, name, description, query, created_by, created_at, updated_at, and tags for the experiment metrics to be saved.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
